EmailTemplate.name: ES-2019-05-08 Custom Suit Boston.Custom Suit Fitting Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Get Suited with Echostor, Zerto & Turbonomic!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://go.pardot.com/l/698943/2019-03-25/fw1]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Attend this Event and Get Fitted for a Suit & (3) Shirts Are you tasked with transforming your data center for a Hybrid Cloud initiative? Are you looking to accelerate your company's IT transformation process? If so, then you know this is a very complex and challenging project.
Join us for an exclusive event to get fitted for a custom BlankLabel suit on Wednesday, May 8th, at 27-43 Wormwood St, Suite 120 Boston, MA 02210. You will get a chance to network and dialog with IT leaders, such as yourself, who are in the midst of similar IT projects and looking to learn about the industry's best hybrid cloud deployment practices.
As space is limited, please RSVP TODAY <[[https://go.pardot.com/l/698943/2019-03-25/fw1]]> to reserve your seat! Custom Suit Fitting & IT Transformation Event BlankLabel Store, 27-43 Wormwood St, Suite 120 Wednesday, May 8th, 4:30PM or 6:00PM EDT | Boston, MA RSVP Here <[[https://go.pardot.com/l/698943/2019-03-25/fw1]]>
Sincerely, The Turbonomic Team
